mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume(resumeno, memberno, title, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, intro, tel, address, career, skills, langskill, wantjob) VALUES(resume_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{intro}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{career}, #{skills}, #{langskill}, #{wantjob})
mapper.select: SELECT resumeno, memberno, title, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, intro, tel, address, career, skills, langskill, wantjob FROM resume WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY resumeno DESC
